remarks: Orthocomplement of a closed subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-2014.)
statement:
dochvalr.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
dochvalr.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochvalr.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochvalr.n $e |- N = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochvalr $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X e. ran I ) -> ( N ` X ) = ( I ` ( ._|_ ` ( `' I ` X ) ) ) ) $.
